GAMEPLAY_BakedBeans.Japanese: ベイクドビーンズの缶詰

GAMEPLAY_BakedBeansDescription.English: Can of Baked Beans. Nothing special. Good for beans on toast, if you´re into that.
GAMEPLAY_BakedBeansDescription.Russian: Банка запечённых бобов. Ничего особенного. Хорошо подходит для тостов с фасолью, если вам это нравится.
GAMEPLAY_BakedBeansDescription.Turkish: Bir kutu kuru fasulye. Özel bir şey değil. Eğer seviyorsanız, yedikten sonra yanınızda kimse olmamasına gayret gösterin.
GAMEPLAY_BakedBeansDescription.Italian: Una lattina di Fagioli al Forno. Niente di speciale. Buono per una fetta di pane tostato con i fagioli, se ti piace.
GAMEPLAY_BakedBeansDescription.German: Eine Dose gebackene Bohnen. Nichts besonderes. Gut für Bohnen auf Toast, wenn du das magst.
GAMEPLAY_BakedBeansDescription.Japanese: ごくありふれたベイクドビーンズの缶詰。ビーンズ・オン・トーストがお好きならどうぞ。
GAMEPLAY_BakedBeansDescription.Traditional Chinese: 一罐焗豆，沒什麼特別的。不過如果你喜歡豆子吐司的話，這倒是絕配。

GAMEPLAY_GroundBeef.Italian: Lattina di Carne di Manzo Macinata

GAMEPLAY_GroundBeefDescription.English: What do you call a cow with no legs? Ground beef!
GAMEPLAY_GroundBeefDescription.Russian: Как называется коровка без ножек? Говяжий фарш!
GAMEPLAY_GroundBeefDescription.Turkish: Bacakları olmayan bir ineğe ne denir? Kıyma!
GAMEPLAY_GroundBeefDescription.Italian: Come chiami una mucca senza le gambe? Carne di Manzo Macinata!
GAMEPLAY_GroundBeefDescription.German: Wie nennt man eine Kuh ohne Beine? Hackfleisch!
GAMEPLAY_GroundBeefDescription.Japanese:
足のない牛を何と呼ぶかって？ 挽いた牛肉(Ground beef)さ！

（訳注：地上を意味するgroundと挽いたを意味するgroundを掛けている）
GAMEPLAY_GroundBeefDescription.Traditional Chinese:
一隻牛沒了腿叫什麼？在地美食！

（原文：What do you call a cow with no legs? Ground beef!）

GAMEPLAY_CrushedTomatoes.Japanese: クラッシュトマトの缶詰

GAMEPLAY_CrushedTomatoesDescription.English: Boring. Needs spices and some protein.
GAMEPLAY_CrushedTomatoesDescription.Russian: Скучно. Нужны приправы и немного белка.
GAMEPLAY_CrushedTomatoesDescription.Turkish: Sıkıcı. Baharat ve biraz protein gerekiyor.
GAMEPLAY_CrushedTomatoesDescription.Italian: Noioso. Servono spezie e qualche proteina.
GAMEPLAY_CrushedTomatoesDescription.German: Langweilig. Benötigt Gewürze und ein bisschen Proteine.
GAMEPLAY_CrushedTomatoesDescription.Japanese: 物足りない。香辛料とタンパク質が必要だ。
GAMEPLAY_CrushedTomatoesDescription.Traditional Chinese: 味道平淡。或許加點香料和蛋白質會更好。

GAMEPLAY_SwedishMeatballs.Japanese: スウェーデン風ミートボールの缶詰

GAMEPLAY_SwedishMeatballsDescription.Japanese: 伝統的なスウェーデン風ミートボールだよ！

GAMEPLAY_ChickenMeatballs.Japanese: チキンミートボールの缶詰

GAMEPLAY_ChickenMeatballsDescription.English: The less-traditional version of Swedish meatballs.
GAMEPLAY_ChickenMeatballsDescription.Turkish: İsveç köftesinin daha az geleneksel versiyonu.
GAMEPLAY_ChickenMeatballsDescription.Italian: La versione meno tradizionale delle polpette svedesi.
GAMEPLAY_ChickenMeatballsDescription.German: Die weniger traditionelle Version von schwedischen Fleischbällchen
GAMEPLAY_ChickenMeatballsDescription.Japanese: 伝統的ではないスウェーデン風ミートボールだ。

GAMEPLAY_AppleSnacks.Japanese: アップルスナックの箱

GAMEPLAY_AppleSnacksDescription.English: Dried, sweet pieces of apple. Yum!
GAMEPLAY_AppleSnacksDescription.Italian: Pezzi di mele secche e dolci. Gnam!
GAMEPLAY_AppleSnacksDescription.Japanese: 乾燥させた甘いリンゴのかけら。うまい！
GAMEPLAY_AppleSnacksDescription.Traditional Chinese: 甜甜的乾燥蘋果片。好吃！

GAMEPLAY_MacCheeseDescription.English: One of the best combinations, maybe ever.
GAMEPLAY_MacCheeseDescription.Russian: Пожалуй, одна из лучших комбинаций ингредиентов, созданная когда-либо.
GAMEPLAY_MacCheeseDescription.Turkish: Belki de gelmiş geçmiş en iyi kombinasyonlardan biri.
GAMEPLAY_MacCheeseDescription.Italian: Una delle migliori combinazioni, forse la migliore.
GAMEPLAY_MacCheeseDescription.German: Eine der besten Kombinationen, vielleicht jemals.
GAMEPLAY_MacCheeseDescription.Japanese: おそらく、最高の組み合わせのひとつだ。
GAMEPLAY_MacCheeseDescription.Traditional Chinese: 這絕對是有史以來最完美的組合之一。

GAMEPLAY_MacCheeseCooked.Japanese: チーズマカロニのボウル

GAMEPLAY_MacCheeseCookedDescription.Italian: Piena di bontà cremosa e formaggiosa.
GAMEPLAY_MacCheeseCookedDescription.Japanese: クリーミーさとチーズの美味しさが一杯だ。
GAMEPLAY_MacCheeseCookedDescription.Traditional Chinese: 充滿濃郁奶油及起司的美味餐食。

GAMEPLAY_PremiumPastaDescription.English: Dried pasta, a good household staple.
GAMEPLAY_PremiumPastaDescription.Russian: Обычные макароны, хороший продукт в любом доме.
GAMEPLAY_PremiumPastaDescription.Turkish: Kurutulmuş makarna, iyi bir ev gıdasıdır.
GAMEPLAY_PremiumPastaDescription.Italian: Pasta secca, Un buon alimento domestico.
GAMEPLAY_PremiumPastaDescription.German: Getrocknete Pasta, ein gutes Grundnahrungsmittel im Haushalt.
GAMEPLAY_PremiumPastaDescription.Japanese: 乾燥パスタ、家庭の定番だ。
GAMEPLAY_PremiumPastaDescription.Traditional Chinese: 乾燥的義大利麵，是家戶必備的主食。

GAMEPLAY_PremiumPastaCookedDescription.English: Boring. Bland. Needs some type of sauce.
GAMEPLAY_PremiumPastaCookedDescription.Russian: Скучно. Пресно. Нужен хоть какой ни будь соус.
GAMEPLAY_PremiumPastaCookedDescription.Turkish: Sıkıcı. Tatsız. Bir çeşit sosa ihtiyaç var.
GAMEPLAY_PremiumPastaCookedDescription.Italian: Noioso. Privo di sapore. Serve qualche tipo di salsa.
GAMEPLAY_PremiumPastaCookedDescription.Japanese: 物足りない。味気ない。何かソースが必要だ。
GAMEPLAY_PremiumPastaCookedDescription.Traditional Chinese: 無趣，而且沒啥味道。或許加點醬料會更好。

GAMEPLAY_MashedPotatoesDescription.English: Powdered Mashed Potatoes, add water to make it edible.
GAMEPLAY_MashedPotatoesDescription.Russian: Пюре быстрого приготовления, залейте кипятком что бы приготовить.
GAMEPLAY_MashedPotatoesDescription.Turkish: Toz Patates Püresi, yenilebilir hale getirmek için su ekleyin.
GAMEPLAY_MashedPotatoesDescription.Italian: Purè di Patate in polvere, aggiungi dell'acqua per renderle commestibili.
GAMEPLAY_MashedPotatoesDescription.German: Pudrige gestampfte Kartoffeln, Wasser hinzufügen um es essbar zu machen.
GAMEPLAY_MashedPotatoesDescription.Japanese: 粉末マッシュポテト、水を加えれば食べられる。
GAMEPLAY_MashedPotatoesDescription.Traditional Chinese: 粉末狀的馬鈴薯泥，加水即可食用。

GAMEPLAY_MashedPotatoesCooked.Japanese: マッシュポテトのボウル

GAMEPLAY_MashedPotatoesCookedDescription.English: Soft, creamy and delicious. Eat it while it´s hot!
GAMEPLAY_MashedPotatoesCookedDescription.Russian: Мягкое, нежное и вкусное. Ешьте пока горячее!
GAMEPLAY_MashedPotatoesCookedDescription.Turkish: Yumuşak, kremsi ve lezzetli. Sıcak yiyin!
GAMEPLAY_MashedPotatoesCookedDescription.Italian: Morbido, cremoso e delizioso. Mangialo mentre è caldo!
GAMEPLAY_MashedPotatoesCookedDescription.German: Weich, cremig und lecker. Iss es, so lange es heiß ist.
GAMEPLAY_MashedPotatoesCookedDescription.Japanese: 柔らかくてクリーミー、そして美味しい。熱いうちに召し上がれ！
GAMEPLAY_MashedPotatoesCookedDescription.Traditional Chinese: 質地鬆軟、味道濃郁且美味。快趁熱吃吧！

GAMEPLAY_AppleSauceJarDescription.English: Basically just apples and sugar, but oh-so-good.
GAMEPLAY_AppleSauceJarDescription.Russian: Просто яблоки и сахар, но очень вкусно.
GAMEPLAY_AppleSauceJarDescription.Turkish: Temelde sadece elma ve şeker, ama çok iyi.
GAMEPLAY_AppleSauceJarDescription.Italian: Fondamentalmente solo mele e zucchero, ma molto buono.
GAMEPLAY_AppleSauceJarDescription.German: Eigentlich nur Äpfel und Zugar, aber so gut!
GAMEPLAY_AppleSauceJarDescription.Japanese: 基本的にはリンゴと砂糖だけ、でもとても美味しい。
GAMEPLAY_AppleSauceJarDescription.Traditional Chinese: 基本上就是蘋果加糖，但真的很好吃。

GAMEPLAY_OrangeBiscuitsDescription.English: Simple Biscuits with a faint orange flavour.
GAMEPLAY_OrangeBiscuitsDescription.Russian: Простые печеньки с лёгким апельсиновым ароматом.
GAMEPLAY_OrangeBiscuitsDescription.Italian: Biscotti semplici con un leggero sapore di arancia.
GAMEPLAY_OrangeBiscuitsDescription.German: Einfache Kekse mit einem Hauch von Orangenaroma
GAMEPLAY_OrangeBiscuitsDescription.Japanese: ほのかなオレンジ風味のシンプルなビスケット。
GAMEPLAY_OrangeBiscuitsDescription.Traditional Chinese: 帶有淡淡橘子香氣的小餅乾。

GAMEPLAY_SausagesDescription.English: Cold sausages in a can. You should probably heat these up.
GAMEPLAY_SausagesDescription.Russian: Холодные сосиски. Вероято, вам стоит их разогреть.
GAMEPLAY_SausagesDescription.Italian: Fredde salsicce in una lattina. Probabilmente dovresti riscaldarle.
GAMEPLAY_SausagesDescription.German: Kalte Würstchen in einer Dose. Vielleicht solltest du sie aufwärmen.
GAMEPLAY_SausagesDescription.Japanese: 缶入りの冷たいソーセージ。君はおそらくこれを温めるだろう。
GAMEPLAY_SausagesDescription.Traditional Chinese: 冷的罐裝香腸。或許該把它們加熱後再食用會更好些。

GAMEPLAY_Pineapples.Japanese: スライスパイナップルの缶詰

GAMEPLAY_PineapplesDescription.English: Sweet slices of pineapple. Perfect on pizza!
GAMEPLAY_PineapplesDescription.Russian: Сладкие колечки ананаса. Идеально на пиццу!
GAMEPLAY_PineapplesDescription.Turkish: Tatlı ananas dilimleri. Pizza üzerinde mükemmel!
GAMEPLAY_PineapplesDescription.Italian: Fette di ananas dolci. Perfette sulla pizza!
GAMEPLAY_PineapplesDescription.Japanese: 甘い薄切りパイナップル。ピザにぴったりだ！
GAMEPLAY_PineapplesDescription.Traditional Chinese:
香甜的鳳梨切片。放在披薩上簡直完美！


*憤怒的義大利噪音*

GAMEPLAY_CheeseDoodles.Japanese: チーズドゥードゥルの袋

GAMEPLAY_CheeseDoodlesDescription.English: Cheesy goodness. Will coat your fingers in orange cheese-dust.
GAMEPLAY_CheeseDoodlesDescription.Russian: Сырное блаженство. Оранжевая сырная крошка покроет ваши пальцы.
GAMEPLAY_CheeseDoodlesDescription.Turkish: Peynir iyidir. Parmaklarınız turuncu peynir tozuna bulanacak.
GAMEPLAY_CheeseDoodlesDescription.Italian: Bontà formaggiosa. Ricoprirà le tue dita in una polvere formaggiosa arancione.
GAMEPLAY_CheeseDoodlesDescription.German: Käsige Göttlichkeit. Überzieht deine Finger mit orangenem Käsestaub.
GAMEPLAY_CheeseDoodlesDescription.Japanese: チーズなおいしさ。指がオレンジ色のチーズの粉まみれになる。
GAMEPLAY_CheeseDoodlesDescription.Traditional Chinese: 美味的起司精華，會讓你的手指沾滿橘色的起司粉。

GAMEPLAY_BabyFoodBanana.Japanese: ベビーフードの瓶（バナナ）

GAMEPLAY_BabyFoodBananaDescription.English: Pretty much just mashed bananas. Sweet and tasty.
GAMEPLAY_BabyFoodBananaDescription.Russian: Приличное количество бананового пюре. Вкусно и сладко.
GAMEPLAY_BabyFoodBananaDescription.Turkish: Muz püresi gibi bir şey. Tatlı ve lezzetli.
GAMEPLAY_BabyFoodBananaDescription.Italian: Praticamente solo un purè di banane. Dolci e gustosi.
GAMEPLAY_BabyFoodBananaDescription.German: Eigentlich nur zerdrückte Bananen. Süß und lecker.
GAMEPLAY_BabyFoodBananaDescription.Japanese: バナナをつぶしただけのもの。甘くておいしい。
GAMEPLAY_BabyFoodBananaDescription.Traditional Chinese: 基本上就是香蕉泥，香甜可口。

GAMEPLAY_BabyFoodCarrot.Japanese: ベビーフードの瓶（ニンジン）

GAMEPLAY_BabyFoodCarrotDescription.English: The sadder version of babyfood, just vegetables. Healthy, but thats about it.
GAMEPLAY_BabyFoodCarrotDescription.Russian: Печальная сторона детского питания. Полезная и только.
GAMEPLAY_BabyFoodCarrotDescription.Turkish: Bebek mamasının daha lezzetsiz versiyonu, sadece sebze. Sağlıklı, hepsi bu.
GAMEPLAY_BabyFoodCarrotDescription.Italian: La versione più triste del cibo per bambini, solo verdura. Sano, ma questo è tutto.
GAMEPLAY_BabyFoodCarrotDescription.German: Die traurigere Version von Babynahrung, nur Gemüse. Gesund, aber das ist es auch schon.
GAMEPLAY_BabyFoodCarrotDescription.Japanese: ほぼ野菜だけながっかりベビーフード。ヘルシーだが、ただそれだけだ。
GAMEPLAY_BabyFoodCarrotDescription.Traditional Chinese: 比較「令人沮喪」版的嬰兒副食品。只有蔬菜，很健康，但也僅此而已。

GAMEPLAY_BabyFoodBerries.Japanese: ベビーフードの瓶（ベリー）

GAMEPLAY_BabyFoodBerriesDescription.English: Mashed berries, a nice dessert in a pinch.
GAMEPLAY_BabyFoodBerriesDescription.Russian: Ягодное пюре, приятный десерт в случае нужды.
GAMEPLAY_BabyFoodBerriesDescription.Turkish: Çilek püresi. Sıkıştığında güzel bir tatlı.
GAMEPLAY_BabyFoodBerriesDescription.Italian: Purè di bacche, un buon dessert in caso di necessità.
GAMEPLAY_BabyFoodBerriesDescription.German: Beerenpüree, zur Not ein schönes Dessert.
GAMEPLAY_BabyFoodBerriesDescription.Japanese: ベリーをつぶしたもの、いざという時のデザートにいい。
GAMEPLAY_BabyFoodBerriesDescription.Traditional Chinese: 搗碎的莓果，在關鍵時刻是不錯的甜點。

GAMEPLAY_BabyFoodPeasDescription.English: Mushy peas. Not the nicest texture, but pairs surprisingly well with some fish.
GAMEPLAY_BabyFoodPeasDescription.Russian: Гороховое пюре. Не самая приятная текстура, но неожиданно хорошо сочетается с рыбой.
GAMEPLAY_BabyFoodPeasDescription.Turkish: Lapa bezelye. Pek hoş bir doku değildir, ancak bazı balıklarla şaşırtıcı derecede iyi uyum sağlar.
GAMEPLAY_BabyFoodPeasDescription.Italian: Purè di piselli. Non ha una buona consistenza, ma si abbina sorprendentemente bene con un po' di pesce.
GAMEPLAY_BabyFoodPeasDescription.German: Erbsenpüree. Nicht die schönste Konsistenz, passt aber überraschend gut zu etwas Fisch.
GAMEPLAY_BabyFoodPeasDescription.Japanese: つぶした豆。食感は良くないが、魚料理に意外と合う。
GAMEPLAY_BabyFoodPeasDescription.Traditional Chinese: 豌豆泥。雖然口感不是很好，但意外地跟魚肉很搭。

GAMEPLAY_SoyMilkDescription.English: Works pretty much the same as milk, but is storeable for much longer.
GAMEPLAY_SoyMilkDescription.Russian: Почти как обычное молоко, но хранится гораздо дольше.
GAMEPLAY_SoyMilkDescription.Turkish: Sütle hemen hemen aynı işlevi görür, ancak çok daha uzun süre saklanabilir.
GAMEPLAY_SoyMilkDescription.Italian: Funziona praticamente come il latte, ma si conserva più a lungo.
GAMEPLAY_SoyMilkDescription.German: Funktioniert fast genauso wie Milch, ist aber viel länger haltbar.
GAMEPLAY_SoyMilkDescription.Japanese: 牛乳とほとんど同じものだが、ずっと長く保存できる。
GAMEPLAY_SoyMilkDescription.Traditional Chinese: 用途與牛奶差不多，但保存期限長得多。

GAMEPLAY_CookiesJam.Japanese: ジャムドロップクッキー

GAMEPLAY_CookiesJamDescription.English: A swedish traditional cookie. Often made with raspberry jam.
GAMEPLAY_CookiesJamDescription.Russian: Традиционное Шведское печенье. Обычно оно с малиновым джемом.
GAMEPLAY_CookiesJamDescription.Turkish: Geleneksel bir İsveç kurabiyesi. Genellikle ahududu reçeli ile yapılır.
GAMEPLAY_CookiesJamDescription.Italian: Biscotti tradizionali della Svezia. Di solito fatte con la marmellata di lampone.
GAMEPLAY_CookiesJamDescription.German: Ein traditioneller schwedischer Keks. Oft mit Himbeermarmelade zubereitet.
GAMEPLAY_CookiesJamDescription.Japanese: スウェーデンの伝統的な菓子。ラズベリージャムを使って作ることが多い
GAMEPLAY_CookiesJamDescription.Traditional Chinese: 一種瑞典傳統餅乾，通常使用覆盆子果醬製作。

GAMEPLAY_TrailMix.Japanese: トレイルミックスの袋

GAMEPLAY_TrailMixDescription.English: Perfect for hikes. A good energy boost!
GAMEPLAY_TrailMixDescription.Russian: Идеально для походов. Хороший источник энергии!
GAMEPLAY_TrailMixDescription.Turkish: Yürüyüşler için mükemmel. İyi bir enerji takviyesi!
GAMEPLAY_TrailMixDescription.Italian: Perfetto per le escursioni. Una buona carica d'energia!
GAMEPLAY_TrailMixDescription.German: Perfekt für Wanderungen. Ein guter Energieschub!
GAMEPLAY_TrailMixDescription.Japanese: ハイキングに最適。良いエネルギー補給になるよ！
GAMEPLAY_TrailMixDescription.Traditional Chinese: 登山遠足的完美補給選擇，能有效補充體能！
